public class MatchArraysTests {

    @Test
    public void matchSameArrays() throws Exception {
        assertEquals(0, MatchArrays.match(new Object[]{},
                new Object[]{}));
        assertEquals(0, MatchArrays.match(null, null));
        assertEquals(0, MatchArrays.match(new Integer[]{1, 2}, new Integer[]{1, 2}));
    }

    @Test
    public void matchAtFirstElement() throws Exception {
        assertEquals(0, MatchArrays.match(new Integer[]{1, 2}, new Integer[]{1}));
    }

    @Test
    public void matchAfterFirstElement() throws Exception {
        assertEquals(1, MatchArrays.match(new Integer[]{1, 2}, new Integer[]{2}));
    }

    @Test
    public void noMatch() throws Exception {
        assertEquals(-1, MatchArrays.match(new Integer[]{1, 2}, new Integer[]{3}));
    }
}
